titleStmt.title: The discourse made before the Royal Society the 26. of November, 1674, concerning the use of duplicate proportion in sundry important particulars together with a new hypothesis of springing or elastique motions / by Sir William Petty, Kt. ...
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

notesStmt.note: "An appendix of elasticity" (p. 121-135) deals with theory of atomic structure.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
